Running FastQC in the fastq files

Keep all the .fastq files in a folder and then run the following code in that folder

```{r}
for fq in *.fastq.gz; do
  fastqc "$fq" -o /path/to/output/folder
done


```


No trimming procedures were performed as the based were of good quality. No adapter content was present. But if one needs to trim the low quality sequences and the adapter, they can run the following
